name: Clovece nezlob
overview: Člověče, nezlob se! is a Czech public domain\freeware game created by Karel Klaizner and Marian Brngál, collectively known as the Methanoids and released in 1995 with releases for DOS and the Atari ST as well as the Amiga. This puzzle game also goes by the name Ludo or "Mensch, ärgere dich nicht".
